missed_clues: Joint hypermobility noted but not investigated
Beighton score not performed despite flexible joints
Chronic fatigue attributed solely to stress
first_diagnosable_visit.reason: Hypermobility and fatigue present but not connected to a connective tissue pattern.

recommendation: Refer to Geneticist or Rheumatologist specializing in connective tissue disorders. Perform formal Beighton score assessment and apply 2017 hEDS diagnostic criteria. Order echocardiogram to rule out vascular involvement. Consider tilt-table test for concurrent POTS evaluation. Initiate physical therapy focused on joint stabilization rather than hypermobility stretching.
